OUTLINE : This open-label study . Patients receive 10-propargyl-10-deazaaminopterin IV 1 hour day 1 . Courses repeat every 14 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients achieve complete response ( CR ) may receive 2 additional course beyond CR . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 39-72 patient ( 12-35 cohort 1 17-37 cohort 2 ) accrue study within 10-36 month .
